title: SET_PED_COMPONENT_VARIATION
content:
0xD4F7B05C// SetPedComponentVariation
void SET_PED_COMPONENT_VARIATION(Ped ped, int componentId, int drawableId, int textureId, int paletteId);Parameters:ped: The ped handle.componentId: The component that you want to set.drawableId: The drawable id that is going to be set. Refer to GET_NUMBER_OF_PED_DRAWABLE_VARIATIONS.textureId: The texture id of the drawable. Refer to GET_NUMBER_OF_PED_TEXTURE_VARIATIONS.paletteId: 0 to 3.This native is used to set component variation on a ped. Components, drawables and textures IDs are related to the ped model.MP Freemode list of components0: Face
1: Mask
2: Hair
3: Torso
4: Leg
5: Parachute / bag
6: Shoes
7: Accessory
8: Undershirt
9: Kevlar
10: Badge
11: Torso 2
List of Component IDs// Components
enum ePedVarComp
{
PV_COMP_INVALID = 0xFFFFFFFF,
PV_COMP_HEAD = 0, // "HEAD"
PV_COMP_BERD = 1, // "BEARD"
PV_COMP_HAIR = 2, // "HAIR"
PV_COMP_UPPR = 3, // "UPPER"
PV_COMP_LOWR = 4, // "LOWER"
PV_COMP_HAND = 5, // "HAND"
PV_COMP_FEET = 6, // "FEET"
PV_COMP_TEEF = 7, // "TEETH"
PV_COMP_ACCS = 8, // "ACCESSORIES"
PV_COMP_TASK = 9, // "TASK"
PV_COMP_DECL = 10, // "DECL"
PV_COMP_JBIB = 11, // "JBIB"
PV_COMP_MAX = 12,
};
This is the server-side RPC native equivalent of the client native SET_PED_COMPONENT_VARIATION.
codeBlocks:

void SET_PED_COMPONENT_VARIATION(Ped ped, int componentId, int drawableId, int textureId, int paletteId);

// Components

{
